title: Medical Pocket Prep
description:
Unlock thousands of Medical certification exam practice questions and mock exams with Pocket Prep, the largest provider of mobile test prep for professional certifications. Whether at home or on the go, reinforce key concepts and improve retention to pass your exam confidently on the first try.

Since 2011, thousands of medical professionals have trusted Pocket Prep to help them succeed on their certification exams. Our questions are crafted by experts and aligned with official exam blueprints, ensuring you're always studying the most relevant, up-to-date content.

**Pocket Prep will help you feel confident and prepared for exam day.**
- **13,000+ Practice Questions:** Expert-authored, exam-like questions with detailed explanations, including textbook references used by educators.
- **Mock Exams:** Simulate test day with full-length mock exams to boost your confidence and readiness.
- **Custom Study Modes:** Customize your quizzes with options like Quick 10, Timed Quiz, and Weakest Subject.
- **Performance Analytics:** Track your progress, identify weak areas, and compare scores with peers.

**Prep for 18 Medical certification exams**, including:
- AAPC CPC® - 750 questions
- AAVSB VTNE® - 1,150 questions
- CDR RD - 1,000 questions
- FSBPT® NPTE-PT - 1,216 questions
- FSBPT® NPTE-PTA - 1,000 questions
- FSMTB MBLEx® - 1,000 questions
- ICVA NAVLE® - 800 questions
- NAWCO WCC® - 700 questions
- NBCOT COTA® - 800 questions
- NBCOT OTR® - 1,000 questions
- NBRC CRT - 500 questions
- NBRC RRT - 600 questions
- NBSTSA CSFA - 500 questions
- NBSTSA CST - 500 questions
- NHA® CCMA - 500 questions
- NHA® CET - 450 questions
- NHA® CPT - 1,000 questions
- PTCB PTCE® - 800 questions

**Begin Your Certification Journey**
Download now and access 30–60 free practice questions across 3 study modes – Question of the Day, Quick 10, and Timed Quiz.

Upgrade to Premium for:
- Full access to all 18 Medical exams
- All advanced study modes, including Custom Quizzes and Level Up
- Full-length mock exams to ensure exam-day success
- Our Pass Guarantee

Choose the plan that fits your goals:
- **1 Month:** $15.99 billed monthly
- **3 Months:** $39.99 billed every 3 months
- **12 Months:** $95.99 billed annually

**Trusted by thousands of medical professionals. Here's what our members say:**
"The way it can target weak areas for improvement was clutch!"

"Looking at my study tools I used to prepare for the CDR, the Pocket Prep app prepared me for the test the best!"

"I passed my exam by a large margin on my first attempt using Pocket Prep!"

“Amazing app, and great/realistic exam like questions! Love the mock exams too and the way it simulates the real environment and allows for thorough review after. Highly recommend and is 100% worth the money if you are considering it. I passed my exam by a large margin on my first attempt using Pocket Prep!”
